name: Wait Switch
description: Activates a local variable after a specified time delay.

fields.name: Triggered Local Variable
fields.description: The local variable number that is triggered or set by this actor after the time has elapsed.

fields.name: Activating Local Variable
fields.description: The local variable number that triggers or activates this actor.

fields.name: Earthquake Strength
fields.description: The strength of the earthquake effects triggered by this actor.

fields.name: Time Until Triggering
fields.description: The total time delay until triggering, consisting of three parts.
